title: Vlad is just a much better version of Morde
body:
{{champion:8}} is just a better battle-mage(?) which do almost the same but more than {{champion:82}} 
Vlad can absorb damage with his health and sustain, doing more AOE burst and bring more utility to the team (Dive, great AOE slow etc)


Damage:
{{champion:8}} E is doing ALMOST as much as {{champion:82}} Q3 but in AOE and ranged (600 unit)
while {{champion:82}} always needs to rely on {{summoner:4}} to hit the Q3{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} (Morde main will know haha)
{{champion:82}} just need to stick so close to deal dmg

Sustain:
{{champion:82}} rely on W2 (190+0.3AP per champion hit, max 2) and shielding with damn low range ability to charge up
while {{champion:8}} rely on Q,R (and sometimes W) to heal back with enpowered Q healing scales with missing health that the healing is undoubtedly much greater
The only thing is that {{champion:8}} can be countered by {{item:3123}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3076}} but {{champion:82}} shield can't.

So it seems that there is no reason to choose{{champion:82}} instead of {{champion:8}} {{sticker:fiora-cool}} 
What do you guys think

An experiment that cost him his Rework slot  and forced 2 years of misery

They serve different purposes. Different playstyles man. Vlad ghosts into backlines to teamfight, morde runs a dragon down mid lane.

If you want to look at it from a "who kills the enemy faster" prospective(which is what the game is right now lord help us) yes vlad is superior.

However if you pick vlad into a good morde prepare to have a bad time.
Basically; it is why I switched from being a morde main to vlad main

they should really just re-revert Morde.
He couldn't be anymore of a pile of garbage than he already is.
And tbh, the damage creep in this game is so over the top, I think this game can afford to have his pre-nerfed shield generation in the game as well.

Yasuo is just better version then morde

has windwall


Everything is better then the gimmick morde is
